MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH64 postcode area of Neston, affecting properties in Mudhouse Lane, Chester High Road and surrounding streets We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.44AM. Repairs to our overhead lines are taking longer than expected because of difficulties on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.08PM on 11th March 2021.
